  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x128
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x128
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x96
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x96 [color=#008000]
        LayoutBR {BR} at (0,1) size 0x73
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,76) size 152x19
          text run at (0,76) width 152: "This line should be green."
